thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 33 of 538
thread.title: Kathleen Meyer

author: Kathleen Meyer
title: Kathleen Meyer
text:
I Love my Fabletics clothes, it's tough to get what I want in my size because it seems they always sell out fast, or I have to wait for my budget to allow the cost and by the time that happens my choices are about gone, it's too bad too cause I would love to buy more but there is always limited supply and I like the leggings as opposed to the capris and the capris usually have all the designs on them...
I do love the matchy matchy things so when something is like a set I would love to have that set, but usually one or the other are sold out...
